name: vega-parser
description: Parse Vega specifications to runtime dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-parser.js -c -m -o build/vega-parser.min.js
scripts.schema: rollup -f umd -g vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -n vega.schema -o build/vega-schema.js -- schema/index.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run rollup && npm run schema
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-parser.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-schema.js build/vega-parser.js build/vega-parser.min.js
